subject: p13964474
History: Patient with esophagopleural fistula and necrotizing pneumonia.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study,. ET tube is in standard position. Right IJ catheter tip is in the upper SVC. There is no pneumothorax. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Esophageal stent is unchanged. Multifocal consolidations consistent with pneumonia that are diffuse, larger in the right perihilar and right lower lobe regions are unchanged. Pneumoperitoneum is again noted.
